short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension showcases the countdown of days until a chosen date directly in your toolbar. (Days Countdown)

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This Chrome extension, Days Countdown, keeps track of the days remaining until a specified date, always visible in your toolbar. It's a simple way to stay organized and focused on your goals, with the flexibility to change dates and event names. Plus, it syncs across devices, providing a consistent countdown experience. Chase your deadlines with ease!
